message: Let's split the money 60/40.  I believe this is a fair offer considering I'm proposing first.
I think 55/45 is a more reasonable split, considering we're now in the second round and the money is worth 10% less. Let's be fair and end this game now.
Bob, I understand your point about fairness and the decreasing value.  I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers. This is my final offer.
